languages.text: {n}Абеляр бросает на вас усталый и немного раздраженный взгляд — так смотрят на дерзящего ребенка.{/n} "Я был бы счастлив соблюдать формальный протокол, госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}, однако обстоятельства позволяют оценивать текущую ситуацию как экстраординарную, а следовательно — позволяющую отойти от наших обычных процедур".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр бросает на вас усталый и немного раздраженный взгляд — так смотрят на дерзящего ребенка.{/n} "Я был бы счастлив соблюдать формальный протокол, госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}, однако обстоятельства позволяют оценивать текущую ситуацию как экстраординарную, а следовательно — позволяющую отойти от процедур мирного времени".

languages.text: {n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from our accustomed procedures."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр бросает на вас усталый и немного раздраженный взгляд — так смотрят на дерзящего ребенка.{/n} "Я был бы счастлив соблюдать формальный протокол, госпо{mf|дин|жа} {name}, однако обстоятельства позволяют оценивать текущую ситуацию как экстраординарную, а следовательно — позволяющую отойти от наших обычных процедур".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from peacetime procedures."

{n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from peacetime procedures."

{n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from peacetime procedures."

{n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from peacetime procedures."

{n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from our accustomed procedures."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德疲惫地看了你一眼，目光有些恼怒，仿佛在看着某个不懂如何尊重别人的孩子一样。{/n}“我也希望可以遵循正式的礼仪，{name}大人，但考虑到现在的处境，我不得不将这种情况视为特殊情况。因此，请允许我采取有别于惯例的做法。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from our accustomed procedures."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德疲惫地看了你一眼，目光有些恼怒，仿佛在看着某个不懂如何尊重别人的孩子一样。{/n}“我也希望可以遵循正式的礼仪，{name}大人，但考虑到现在的处境，我不得不将这种情况视为特殊情况。因此，请允许我采取与平时不同的做法。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard te lanza una mirada cansada y algo irritada: la clase de mirada que se suele dedicar a un niño maleducado.{/n} «Me encantaría seguir el protocolo formal, maestr{mf|o|a} {name}, pero las circunstancias me obligan a considerar esta situación como extraordinaria, y eso me permite desviarme de los procedimientos acostumbrados».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from our accustomed procedures."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard te lanza una mirada cansada y algo irritada: la clase de mirada que se suele dedicar a un niño maleducado.{/n} «Me encantaría seguir el protocolo formal, maestr{mf|o|a} {name}, pero las circunstancias me obligan a considerar esta situación como extraordinaria, y eso me permite desviarme de los procedimientos de paz».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは、疲れたような、どこか苛立った視線をあなたに向ける。それは、無礼な子供に対するような目つきだ。{/n}「正式な手順に喜んで従うつもりです、{name}様。しかし、我はこの状況が非常事態だと判断せざるを得ず、そのため、平時の手順からの逸脱が許容される状況だと考えています」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from our accustomed procedures."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは、疲れたような、どこかイライラしたような視線をあなたに向ける。ちょうど、人が失礼な子供を見るのと同じ目だ。{/n}「私は正式な手順に喜んで従うつもりです、{mf|マスター|ミストレス} {name}。しかし、私はこの状況が異常だと判断せざるを得ない。そのため、平時の手順からの逸脱が許容される状況だと考える」
{n}アベラルドは、疲れたような、どこか苛立った視線をあなたに向ける。それは、無礼な子供に対するような目つきだ。{/n}「正式な手順に喜んで従うつもりです、{name}様。しかし、我はこの状況が非常事態だと判断せざるを得ず、そのため、平時の手順からの逸脱が許容される状況だと考えています」

languages.text: {n}Abélard vous lance un regard fatigué et légèrement agacé, comme s'il était face à {mf|un|une} enfant mal {mf|élevé|élevée}.{/n} « Je me ferais une joie de respecter le protocole établi, {mf|maître|maîtresse} {name}, mais les circonstances m'obligent à considérer cette situation comme exceptionnelle, ce qui me permet de prendre certaines libertés. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from our accustomed procedures."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard vous lance un regard fatigué et légèrement agacé, comme s'il était face à {mf|un|une} enfant mal {mf|élevé|élevée}.{/n} « Je me ferais une joie de respecter le protocole établi, {mf|maître|maîtresse} {name}, mais les circonstances m'obligent à considérer cette situation comme exceptionnelle, ce qui me permet de prendre certaines libertés. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard wirft dir einen müden und leicht irritierten Blick zu – als wärst du ein respektloses Kind.{/n} "Ich würde dem üblichen Protokoll liebend gerne folgen, {mf|Herr|Herrin} {name}, aber die Umstände zwingen mich dazu, die Lage als außergewöhnlich zu betrachten, wodurch Abweichungen von unseren gewohnten Prozeduren gestattet sind."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from our accustomed procedures."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard wirft dir einen müden und leicht irritierten Blick zu – wie bei einem respektlosen Kind.{/n} "Ich würde dem üblichen Protokoll liebend gerne folgen, {mf|Herr|Herrin}{name}, aber die Umstände zwingen mich dazu, die Lage als außergewöhnlich zu betrachten, wodurch Abweichungen von der Prozedur in Friedenszeiten gestattet sind."

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} , but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from our accustomed procedures."

languages.text: {n}Abelard sana tıpkı saygısız bir çocuğa bakar gibi yorgun ve biraz da kızgın bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Resmî protokolleri uygulamaktan memnuniyet duyardım {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım} ancak şartlar gereği bu vaziyeti olağanüstü bir durum olarak ele almakla yükümlüyüm ve bu da kişiye alışılmış prosedürlerin dışına çıkma hakkı verir."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard gives you a tired and somewhat irritated glance — the same way one looks at a disrespectful child.{/n} "I would be glad to follow formal protocol, {mf|Master|Mistress} {name}, but I am obliged by the circumstances to view this situation as an extraordinary one, and therefore one that permits deviations from our accustomed procedures."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard sana tıpkı saygısız bir çocuğa bakar gibi yorgun ve biraz da kızgın bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Resmî protokolleri uygulamaktan memnuniyet duyardım {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım} ancak şartlar gereği bu vaziyeti olağanüstü bir durum olarak ele almakla yükümlüyüm ve bu da kişiye alışılmış prosedürlerin dışına çıkma hakkı verir."
